p: Smash, pass 80‐mesh sieve → ethyl acetate degreasing (ratio of liquid to material 1:6 mg/ml, 48 hr)→air‐drying (37°C, 48 hr)→ addition of Tris‐HCL protein extraction with 1.5 mol/L concentration and 8.8 pH (ratio of liquid to material 1:38 mg/ml, 42°C, 100 min)→obtain supernatant after centrifugalization (2,810 g, 15 min)→ammonium sulfate precipitation (4.25 mol/L, 25°C)→ dialysis desalting (10 kDa, 25°C, 48 hr)→ freeze‐drying (−60°C, 36 hr).
